original_text: So the king of Assyria agreed to do what Ahaz had asked him to do. He attacked Damascus and he took the city for himself. He sent the people who had lived there to Kir as his prisoners. He punished King Rezin with death.
korean_text: 앗수르 왕이 그 청을 듣고 곧 올라와서 다메섹을 쳐서 점령하여 그 백성을 사로잡아 기르로 옮기고 또 르신을 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: So the king of Assyria agreed
to do what Ahaz had asked him to do
and he took the city for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그 도시를 자신을 위해 차지했습니다

sentences.original_text: He sent the people who had lived there
He punished King Rezin with death
